text: Björn Kristian Ulvaeus (credited as Björn Ulvæus ; born 25 April 1945), Ulvaeus pronounces his name at 0:08, Retrieved 31 May 2017 is a Swedish songwriter, producer, a former member of the Swedish musical group ABBA (1972–1982), and co-composer of the musicals Chess, Kristina från Duvemåla, and Mamma Mia!. He co-produced the movie Mamma Mia! with fellow ABBA member and close friend Benny Andersson. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish screenwriters Category:Swedish singer- songwriters Category:Swedish composers Category:Swedish movie producers Category:Writers from Gothenburg Category:ABBA members Category:Musicians from Gothenburg
title: Björn Ulvaeus
